title: Pixel 4 causing 2014 BMW iDrive to crash and reboot continually
content:
Pixel 4 causing 2014 BMW iDrive to crash and reboot continually. Dealer installed new s/w but still not working. Dealer thinks it might be head unit issue and may recommend replacing it.  $$$$? It was fine with old Android.

 I have paired and unpaired multiple times- clearing car from phone and phone information from car each time to no avail.
